title: Can the Rockets and Jazz Turn It Around? | The Mismatch (Ep. 344)
description:
The Houston Rockets’ slow start might be the new normal (0:50), the Orlando Magic are ... good? (19:40), and the young New York Knicks continue to develop (36:01). Plus, the quarter-season awards (47:03).
Hosts: Chris Vernon, Kevin O’Connor
